title: Luxurious 2 bed / 1 bath with washer and dryer included
posting_body: ['Shadow Lake - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 2 / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1100 sq ft', 'Rent: $1495/Month', 'Terms: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Shadow Lake, professionally managed by Ventron Management, offers 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans with many options including a patio or sunroom.', 'Other interior features include full size washer and dryer connections, optional fireplaces, decorative chair rails in the dining areas and optional upgrades.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Breakfast Bar', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '● Sunroom', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Extended living room area', '● Fireplace in Select Units', '● Fully Equipped Kitchens', '● Hardwood Floors', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● In Unit Washer & Dryer', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '● Views', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● Business Center', '● Cable/Satellite Available', '● Central Air', '● Clubhouse', '● Dogs & Cats Welcome', '● Extended living room area', '● Fitness Center', '● Picnic Area with Grill', '● Smoke Free', '● Tennis Courts', '● Clothes Care Center', '● Lake on Site', '● Laundry Facilities', '● MARTA Access', '● Pet Care', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Scenic Lake', '● Se Habla Espanol', '● Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '● Wooded Views', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AA82EC995909455']
